tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_interactions (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  email_address VARCHAR(255),
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE email_engagement (
    email_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email_subject VARCHAR(255),
    sent_time TIMESTAMP,
    open_count INT,
    click_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE email_engagement (
    engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    email_id INT,
    engagement_type VARCHAR(20),
    engagement_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE marketing_emails (
  email_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  subject VARCHAR(255),
  body TEXT,
  send_date TIMESTAMP,
  recipient_ids UUID[],
  opened BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE email_interactions (
  interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  email_id INT REFERENCES marketing_emails(email_id),
  customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE email_clicks (
  click_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  interaction_id INT REFERENCES email_interactions(interaction_id),
  link_clicked TEXT,
  click_date TIMESTAMP
)
